title: Mystery byÂ Wipers
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You think I'm retrospective
Of someone you used to know
I think it's indecision
That leaves us such a long way to go

[Pre-Chorus]
But you say,

Try to make amends
So it will never end

[Hook]
You don't care about it
You don't care about it
You don't care about it
You don't care about it

[Post-Chorus]
But can't you see?
It's a mystery

[Verse 2]
I always try to wonder
How it must feel to be real
In one door, out the other
Undercover, do you think it shows?
[Pre-Chorus]
But you say,

Try to make amends
So it will never end

[Chorus]
You don't care about it
You don't care about it
You don't care about it
You don't care about it

[Post-Chorus]
But can't you see?
It's a mystery
